pages.title: Fluid Injector
pages.text: The Fluid Injector allow you to insert the fluid needed to re-process wastes into the Reprocessor.$(br2)Different waste types may require different fluids.

pages.usage.text: $(l)Mandatory:$() one, and only one, is required$(br)$(l)Valid positions:$() any vertical face (not on frame)$(br)$(l)Graphical interface:$() no
